thread.title: ALTA Member Airlines Passenger Traffic Increased 7.6% in July 2015Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: ALTA Member Airlines Passenger Traffic Increased 7.6% in July 2015Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: ALTA Member Airlines Passenger Traffic Increased 7.6% in July 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
ALTA Member Airlines Passenger Traffic Increased 7.6% in July 2015
The Latin American and Caribbean Air Transport Association (ALTA) announced that its member airlines carried 17.5 million passengers in July, up 7.6% -or 1.2 million additional passengers- from the previous year.
Traffic (RPK) grew 8.8% and capacity (ASK) increased 7.2%, bringing up the load factor to 83.2%, 1.2 percentage points higher than in July 2014.
Year-to-date, the number of passengers carried from January to July increased 5.7% versus the same period of the previous year, reaching 109.0 million passengers, or 5.9 million more passengers vs. January-July 2014. During the aforementioned period, traffic (RPK) rose 6.4%, capacity (ASK) increased 5.5%, and the passenger load factor reached 79.8%, 0.6 percentage points higher than the previous year.
Freight ton kilometers declined 6.3% in July and 7.3% year to date.
Source:- ALTA
